page.title: 17MERE GOLF AND COUNTRY CLUB
page.content: AROUND THE MERE ARE LARGE, HIGH CLASS HOUSES OF INDIVIDUAL CHARACTER;VERY DESIRABLE THOUGH BURGLARIES ARE A WORRY. { THE MERE GOLF AND COUNTRY CLUB}HAS MOST ATTRACTIVE FACILITIES. ITS GREENS OVERLOOKING THE MERE HAVE HOSTED DUNLOP MASTERS MATCHES. THE CLUB HOUSE WAS LARGELY REBUILT AFTER A FIRE IN 1973 BUT STILL RETAINS SOME OF THE CHARACTER OF THE NEO-ELIZABETHAN HOME BUILT BY THE LANGFORD BROOKE FAMILY IN 1834. THE COUNTRY CLUB PROVIDES MANY FACILITIES FROM SAUNAS TO A SWIMMING POOL,SQUASH, SNOOKER AND ALL WEATHER TENNIS COURTS.RESTAURANT FACILITIES RANGE FROM COFFEE BAR TO PARTY SUITE FOR 200. FOR LESS AFFLUENT LOCALS THERE IS A THE MERE AND OVER TABLEY PARISH CLUB IN THE FORMER VILLAGE SCHOOL. { }
